thread.title: Salim Khan discharged after surgery
thread.title_full: Salim Khan discharged after surgery - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Salim Khan discharged after surgery
text:
Veteran scriptwriter Salim Khan, who underwent a hernia surgery in a Bandra hospital on Tuesday was discharged on Wednesday evening.
Post surgery, the doctors had kept him under observation for a day. Right through his hospital stay, Salman, Arbaaz and Sohail were there. Helen was seen accompanying Salim saab back home.
